name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specifically skilled in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Node.js**. Proficient in building responsive front-end solutions using **HTML5** and **CSS**, and experienced in implementing cloud-native architectures on **AWS** and **AzureDevOps**. Demonstrated ability to design and integrate APIs, fostering efficient data communication.

Expert in Problem Solving and Team Collaboration, combining technical skills with a strong commitment to delivering innovative solutions. Background in developing AI/ML-powered platforms with a focus on predictive analytics and automation. Adept in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Knowledgeable in deploying serverless architectures and managing databases with **DynamoDB**. My creativity in tackling complex challenges has consistently driven successful project outcomes.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust web applications utilizing **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, **TypeScript**, and **React** (17–18), ensuring high performance and scalability.
• Engaged in proactive problem solving by implementing backend APIs and utilizing cloud services like **AWS** and **AzureDevOps** for seamless deployments and integrations.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, fostering team collaboration to accelerate project delivery and enhance efficiency in software development processes.
• Designed intuitive user interfaces with **HTML5** and **CSS**, leveraging creativity to enhance user experience and engagement across applications.
• Led efforts in migrating legacy systems to **serverless** architectures, resulting in 30% increased efficiency and reduction of operational costs.
• Crafted state-of-the-art APIs for third-party integrations, adhering to best practices for **API** development, security, and documentation.
• Employed modern development strategies and tools, achieving 95% test coverage through automated testing frameworks, ensuring reliability and performance of the applications.
• Enhanced application responsiveness by implementing advanced front-end functionalities, contributing to a 40% boost in user engagement metrics.
• Actively participated in code reviews and knowledge-sharing sessions to elevate team standards of coding practices and performance.
• Championed innovative solutions that improved application performance, solving critical issues and maintaining high availability of systems to support business operations.

Utilized **JavaScript**, **Node.js** (NestJS/Express), and **TypeScript** to modernize core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Developed interactive front-end applications using **React** (v18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **HTML5/CSS**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards employing **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture utilizing **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Built and developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing for **over 10TB** of data.
Implemented machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns with **95%** accuracy.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services, increasing efficiency by **30%**.

Developed dynamic and responsive applications using **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React** (18), **HTML5**, and **CSS**, ensuring fast user interactions and compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
Engineered robust backend services with **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) for a scalable e-commerce platform, achieving **99.9%** availability and optimized performance in high-traffic situations.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions, utilizing **AWS** and **DynamoDB** to enhance application reliability and decrease infrastructural overhead by **30%**.
Implemented RESTful **API** services and integrated third-party payment platforms like **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay** for secure transactions, ensuring **PCI** compliance and safeguarding user data.
Optimized application performance through problem-solving strategies, leveraging **Serverless** architecture to reduce operational costs by **25%** while maintaining efficiency.
Applied modern CI/CD practices with **Azure DevOps**, enhancing team collaboration and accelerating deployment cycles by **50%** through automated testing and feature integrations.
Designed and developed customizable UI components, driving user engagement and creativity while supporting mobile-first approaches in line with business objectives.
Utilized strong analytical skills to troubleshoot and resolve issues, fostering continuous improvement in software development processes and team dynamics.
